name: prompt_user
author: AFNI Developers
description: Tool that prompts a window requesting user input with a custom message.

inputs.description: Pops a window prompting the user with MESSAGE. If MESSAGE is '-', it is read from stdin.
inputs.name: Pause Message

inputs.description: Timeout in seconds for the prompt message. Default answer is returned if TT seconds elapse without user input.
inputs.name: Timeout
